messages.title: I AM READY
messages.content:
To replace business rates with a simpler system to help small High Street retailers
For a Clean-Break Brexit which will reduce tariffs to zero on certain foods, footwear and clothing
To abolish interest on student loans and improve incentives for employers to recruit apprentices
To cancel HS2 and invest in regional road and rail infrastructure
To support the Leamington Old Town Cultural Quarter

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We must control our laws, borders, money, and defence.
Let's make Parliament serve the people.
Keep investing, better management, less waste.
Spend £100bn on transport and jobs in the regions.
We need a fair, firm points-based system.

Keep investing, better management, less waste.

Controlled Immigration

community.content: To support the Leamington Old Town Cultural Quarter

leaflet.personalStatement:
Educated at Myton School, I am a passionate supporter of the cultural and artistic life of our area.

I was a long-term carer and understand the vital importance our NHS and Social Care services play. We will invest in the NHS to train more medical staff and extend GP surgery availability.

Local businesses face unfair competition from online sales. We will introduce an online sales tax, level the playing field by slashing business rates, then introduce zero-rated corporation tax on companies with pre-tax profits of under £50,000.
